Class ProductController

      @PostMapping(path="/new-product") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createNewProduct(org.springframework.http.HttpEntity<String> entity)
      Creates a new product to add to the database The new product has a product name, product number, current stock, a department and potentially a barcode
      Parameters:
      entity - The data coming from frontend
      Returns:
      response bad request if failed and ok if succeeded

      Returns:

      Deletes a product from all the tables the product linked
      Parameters:
      entity - Http request from the client
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity 200 if product is deleted and 400 if not or exception is present
